ingredients.ingredient: 1 pound Brussels sprouts, trimmed and halved
salt and ground black pepper to taste
salt and ground black pepper to taste

cookingTips: Cut Brussels sprouts uniformly and place cut-side down on baking sheet for even roasting and caramelization
Add fresh thyme early but cranberries partway through roasting to prevent them from drying out
Brussels sprouts are done when outer leaves are crispy and interior is tender
enrichment.coachingPrompt: Explain the importance of cut-side-down placement for achieving crispy exteriors and how tart cranberries balance savory thyme.
